title: Building a Professional LinkedIn Profile - 2022
headline: Explore the most effective techniques for creating a strong online presence on LinkedIn with this free online course.
description: Do you want to build a solid LinkedIn profile? Or do you have a LinkedIn profile that no one seems to be paying adequate attention to? This short course will guide you through creating a professional LinkedIn profile that is distinctive and sets you apart on the platform. In addition, we will examine the importance of clarifying your target audience and consider the best practices for using keywords that resonate with your brand or story.

courseDescription:
With more than 840 million active users, LinkedIn has established itself as the premier professional online networking platform. However, many people build their profiles without any particular direction. A professional LinkedIn profile is one in which the member purposefully writes the content focused on their target audience using keywords and experiences relevant to who they are and what they do that applies to their target audience. This course aims to help you create a distinctive and professional profile on LinkedIn.

We begin by exploring the LinkedIn networking platform, reviewing the relevant perquisites and considering who should have one. You will also study how to effectively focus on your target audience using rich keywords and phrases throughout the content of your LinkedIn profile. Examine important aspects needed to maximise its worth by including information that will appeal to your followers. These include the introduction card, contact information, ‘About’ page and more.

Additionally, you will learn how to test the keyword richness of your LinkedIn profile using specialised software or websites. Teddy Burriss of Burriss Consulting Inc., the publisher, offers training and coaching programmes for business people on how to make the most of this platform. If you want to be easily discovered on LinkedIn and constantly communicate with potential businesses or clients, sign up for this course today to learn all you need to get started.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will teach you what a professional LinkedIn profile looks like, how to build one, and who should have it. You will also discover how to determine your target audience and employ the most effective keywords to reach them. Examine the most critical parts of your LinkedIn profile and how to fill them out with rich content.

Key Areas of a LinkedIn Profile
Improving Your LinkedIn Profile - Lesson Summary

  • Lesson Summary

  • The key points from this module are:
  • LinkedIn is the number one professional networking site globally, with over 840 million members and approximately two new members every second. It is also an essential tool for you to build your brand, reputation and network in your workplace space.
  • Some requirements for a professional LinkedIn profile are as follows.
    1. It should be a profile written to speak clearly to a specific group of people using words that resonate with them.
    2. It should be a profile that stays aligned with your changing business/career goals.
    3. It should be a profile that appears on Google, and LinkedIn searches for keywords/phrases your target audience uses to describe what you do for them.
    4. It should be a profile that uses any or all the sections available to tell your target audience you are the resource they are searching for.
  • The following are some people who should have a professional LinkedIn profile.
    1. Business developers who want to be found by their target audience.
    2. Business professionals in career transition who want to be seen by those who need their skills and experiences
    3. Recruiters who want to show future candidates and hiring managers that they can help both of those.
